A device that converts electricity into heat. It can automatically turn itself on or off to reach a specific target temperature.
It is guaranteed to connect to an available power source and heat up the surrounding area, and is therefore confirmed to be more useful than Gun-May.

A simple beehouse where bees will live and generate honeycombs for you.

Some may procrastinate and neglect their beekeeping responsibilities for some time, while reports of starvation circulate widely. A curious and unusual predicament, given the fact that honey is readily available.

A working beehouse will have a beneficial effect on any plant crops in a 6 tile radius (displayed when selected) around it: harvested plants have a 25% chance to generate a partially grown pollinated offshoot of the same plant. Bear in mind that bees should be active at the moment the harvesting takes place.
